member.name: T:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GamePort
member.summary: A class that captures details about a game server port.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GamePort.Name
member.summary: The friendly name / identifier for the port, specified by the game developer in the Build configuration.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GamePort.ServerListeningPort
member.summary: The port at which the game server should listen on (maps externally to ). For process based servers, this is determined by Control Plane, based on the ports available on the VM. For containers, this is specified by the game developer in the Build configuration.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GamePort.ClientConnectionPort
member.summary: The public port to which clients should connect (maps internally to ).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GameserverSDK.ReadyForPlayers
member.summary: Called when the game server is ready to accept clients. If Start() hasn't been called by this point, it will be called implicitly here.
member.returns: True if the game server was allocated (clients are about to connect). False if the game server was terminated and is about to be shut down.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GameserverSDK.GetGameServerConnectionInfo
member.summary: Gets information (ipAddress and ports) for connecting to the game server, as well as the ports the game server should listen on.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GameserverSDK.Start(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Kicks off communication threads, heartbeats, etc. Called implicitly by ReadyForPlayers if not called beforehand.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GameserverSDK.UpdateConnectedPlayers(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.ConnectedPlayer})
member.summary: Tells the PlayFab service information on who is connected.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GameserverSDK.RegisterShutdownCallback(System.Action)
member.summary: Gets called if the server is shutting us down

member.name: M:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GameserverSDK.RegisterHealthCallback(System.Func{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Gets called when the agent needs to check on the game's health

member.name: M:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GameserverSDK.RegisterMaintenanceCallback(System.Action{System.DateTimeOffset})
member.summary: Gets called if the server is getting a scheduled maintenance, it will get the UTC Datetime of the maintenance event as an argument.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GameserverSDK.GetLogsDirectory
member.summary: Returns the directory whose contents will be uploaded so logs can be easily retrieved
member.returns: A path to the directory to place logs in

member.name: M:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GameserverSDK.GetSharedContentDirectory
member.summary: Returns the directory whose contents are shared among all game servers within a VM.
member.returns: A path to the directory where shared content can be stored (temporarily).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GameserverSDK.GetInitialPlayers
member.summary: After allocation, returns a list of the initial players that have access to this game server, used by PlayFab's Matchmaking offering
member.returns: A list of player ids of the initial players that will connect

member.name: M:Microsoft.Playfab.Gaming.GSDK.CSharp.GameserverSDK.LogMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a custom log message to the GSDK log output
